name: The Long Man
description:
Long Man

Gameplay Instructions
WASD to walk
Mouse to look around
Shift to run
Space bar to jump
F to flashlight on/off
R to restart the game

Long Man is a game made for the Epic MegaJam 2021 in a week on the theme of Running Out Of Space!

It's my first solo dev project that I've seen through to completion and I'm super happy with how it's come out so far.

Are you ready to solve the maze puzzle? In Long Man, you try to get out of the maze with a limited number of jumps and puzzles.

Currently the game consists of 1 labyrinth, may be planned for after the jam depending on reception.
